group_1.textCenter: I'm gonna open the door that the voice told me to!

group_1.textLeft: It looks like some kind of house...?
Rikoooo, I'm over here!

group_1.textRight: Oh, sorry...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh... Riko and Ash?

group_1.textRight: Oh! Himika!

group_1.textLeft: I guess you appeared in my dream because@I met you yesterday...?

group_1.textRight: I'm here to solve your problems!

group_1.textCenter: You're going to say that out of nowhere...?!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa... Definitely a dream! What a sudden and@mysterious development...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? Are you not troubled...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, ummm...
I don't have any idea what's going on here,@but...
Suddenly being asked that is also troubling...
I see...so that's what's going on here...

group_1.textRight: So, got any problems?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... I'm not really troubled...
There's something I regret a little, but...

group_1.textRight: What's that?

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't give movie tickets to my family...

group_1.textCenter: Oh, Himika's family is really big.
She's got lots of little brothers and sisters.

group_1.textRight: A big family...! Sounds like a lot of fun!

group_1.textLeft: Yes! We're very fortunate to have each other.
However, we're poor, so we can't afford luxuries.
But...

group_1.narration: "The other day,@I was offered tickets to a movie screening.@Only two tickets..."
"I turned it down because I couldn't go with my whole family...@But since it's a rare opportunity, I thought maybe I should've@gotten it and decided who would go by playing@rock-paper-scissors..."
"But then again,@my siblings who couldn't go would be sad,@so maybe it was the right decision after all..."

group_1.textLeft: So now, I keep thinking about how nice it would@have been if we could have all seen it together...

group_1.textRight: Huh... Movies are soooo good...
My dad was a film director and my mom is an@actress.
So I'm really fond of movies too.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Amazing!! Are you actually crazy-rich...?!

group_1.textRight: ...Oh! I've got an idea!
If you can watch a movie together as a family,@your problem will be solved, right...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I suppose so, but that's just a@pipe dream...

group_1.textRight: Then... I'll invite you over to my place!

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: I have a home theater, so you can bring your@whole family!
I brought the home theater set from back home.

group_1.textLeft: ...But, we're a family of 8...

group_1.textRight: There's enough room for 10 or so people!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
What kind of place are you living at?!

group_1.textRight: I live by myself, so it's just one room.@About a thousand square feet?

group_1.textLeft: You live on a completely different scale...!
But... I'm sure we're gonna cause a lot of noise.@Is that okay?

group_1.textRight: No problem!! The soundproofing's perfect!
Having a lively atmosphere would be a blast.
So you ought to come visit with your siblings!

group_1.textLeft: ...If that's the case, I'd love to!

group_1.textCenter: Huh...?! Those scissors are moving on@their own...?!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what's going on?! They're floating?!
Oh my gosh!! It cut your ribbon?!
I'm sorry!! Gomen nasai!!

group_1.textLeft: The flying scissors gave me a scare, but...
I don't mind it that much.

group_1.textRight: But, you said that ribbon calms you down when@you hold it...
You must've loved it...

group_1.textLeft: Well... I'm not really sure why I liked it...

group_1.textRight: Really...? Honto...?

group_1.textLeft: Looking at it now, it's really weird...@Why did I even like it...?

group_1.textRight: Well, I'm relieved that you don't mind...
[chara:305201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: We're back where we started...?

group_1.textRight: That's what it looks like...?
